content: Die App kann schon viel, aber warum lassen sich die Scheiben oder das Schiebedach nicht über die App öffnen bzw. schließen. An die Entwickler, bitte nachbessern.
Translation A: The app can already do a lot, but why can't the windows or the sunroof be opened or closed via the app? To the developers, please improve this.
Translation B: The app can do a lot, but why can't the windows or sunroof be opened or closed via the app? Developers, please fix this.

content: Leider genauso enttäuscht wie viele hier über die App. Ich kann weder den Status über meinen 7-er sehen noch sonst die App richtig nutzen. Leider hat mir die BMW Schweiz Hotline auch ned wirklich weiterhelfen können. Eigentlich sehr schade.....
Translation A: Unfortunately, just as disappointed as many here about the app. I can’t see the status of my 7-series, nor can I really use the app otherwise. Unfortunately, the BMW Switzerland hotline couldn't really help me either. Actually a real shame....
Translation B: Unfortunately, I'm just as disappointed with the app as many here. I can't see the status of my 7 Series, nor can I use the app properly. Unfortunately, the BMW Switzerland hotline hasn't been able to help me much either. It's a real shame...

content: Top App, verständlich, übersichtlich und funktional.
Translation A: Top App, understandable, clear, and functional.
Translation B: Top app, understandable, clear and functional.

content: An sich eine informative App. Leider bleibt sie oft hängen. Die fehlende Stabilität nervt.
Translation A: An informative app in itself. Unfortunately, it often freezes. The lack of stability is annoying.
Translation B: An informative app in itself. Unfortunately, it often crashes. The lack of stability is annoying.

content: Super App. Alles über Handy abrufbar. Vom Tanken bis hin zur HU. Sehr Empfehlenswert. Dafür gibt es auch 5 Sterne 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
Translation A: Super App. Everything retrievable via mobile phone. From refueling to the vehicle inspection (HU). Highly recommended. That’s why it gets 5 stars 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
Translation B: Great app. Everything is accessible via your phone. From refueling to vehicle inspections. Highly recommended. 5 stars for that. 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟

content: Einfach eine sehr gute und hilfreiche App.
Translation A: Simply a very good and helpful app.
Translation B: Simply a very good and helpful app.

content: Die komplizierteste App die es überhaupt gibt. Bis so ein Update bei dem Auto ankommt kriegt ne alte Frau n Kind. Selbst ein Stern ist noch zu viel
Translation A: The most complicated app there is, period. By the time an update like that arrives in the car, an elderly woman will have a child. Even one star is too much.
Translation B: The most complicated app ever. By the time an update like this reaches the car, an old woman will have a baby. Even one star is too much.

content: App sehr schön aber alle Funktionen funktionieren nicht weil mein Auto zu alt ist 2014 es soll ein Update kommen aber wann ist die Frage. LG an BMW Update 30.11 noch schlechter
Translation A: App very nice but not all functions work because my car is too old, 2014. An update is supposed to come, but when is the question. Regards to BMW. Update 30.11 even worse.
Translation B: The app is very nice, but all functions don't work because my car is too old (2014). There's supposed to be an update, but when is the question. Regards to BMW. Update 30.11 is even worse.

content: Alles wichtige ist schnell abrufbar
Translation A: Everything important is quickly accessible.
Translation B: Everything important is quickly accessible

content: Funktioniert einwandfrei. Bin bis jetzt voll und ganz zufrieden.
Translation A: Works flawlessly. I’m completely satisfied so far.
Translation B: Works perfectly. I'm completely satisfied so far.

content: Schrott, man kann sich gar nicht mehr anmelden. Sobald man auf das Feld für die Passworteingabe klickt, schmeißt es einen gleich komplett raus. Ein Stern ist auch zu viel 👎
Translation A: Junk, you can't even log in anymore. As soon as you click on the password field, it completely kicks you out. One star is too much 👎
Translation B: It's crap, you can't even log in anymore. As soon as you click on the password field, it kicks you out completely. One star is too many 👎

content: Ist bei manchen Modellen, wie z.b. bei meinem 320ger g21 ohne teueres Abo (89 Euro im Jahr) unbrauchbar. Es ist keine einzige Funktion möglich. Schade.
Translation A: It's unusable on some models, like my 320 g21, without the expensive subscription (€89 per year). Not a single function is possible. Shame.
Translation B: On some models, like my 320 g21, it's unusable without an expensive subscription (€89 per year). Not a single function is available. What a shame.

content: Die App lief 2 Tage auf meinem neuen Handy danach beim Öffnen verbindet sie sich ganz kurz mit meinem neuen bmw f39 und stürzt ab. War zu bmw Händler er meinte es läge an der App
Translation A: The app ran for 2 days on my new phone, then when opening it, it connects briefly to my new BMW F39 and crashes. I took it to a BMW dealer and he said it was due to the app.
Translation B: The app ran on my new phone for two days, but when I opened it, it briefly connected to my new BMW F39 and crashed. I went to the BMW dealer, and he said it was the app.

content: Es fehlen wichtige Infos zu meinen f11 lci über tankfüllstand und Kilometerstand. Auch ist die App und die Verbindung zum Fahrzeug sehr langsam. Hier erwarte uch mehr Performance.
Translation A: Important information regarding my F11 LCI is missing, specifically about fuel level and mileage. Also, the app and the connection to the vehicle are very slow. I expect more performance here.
Translation B: My F11 LCI is missing important information about the fuel level and mileage. The app and the connection to the vehicle are also very slow. I expect better performance here.

content: schade dass der Concierge Service eingestellt wurde. und bitte die Fahrzeugortung erweitern
Translation A: “It’s a shame the Concierge Service was discontinued. And please expand the vehicle location feature.”
Translation B: It's a shame the concierge service has been discontinued. And please expand the vehicle tracking feature.

content: Die App hat immer gut funktioniert. Seit dem letzten Update kann ich meine Fahrten nicht mehr ansehen.
Translation A: The app has always worked well. Since the last update, I can no longer view my journeys.
Translation B: The app always worked well. Since the last update, I can no longer view my trips.

content: Ständig die Neuanmeldung, die dann auch noch nicht Mal funktioniert. Dann wird man genötigt Chrome zu nutzen, was auch nicht funktioniert. Fragt man sich, was für Programmierer von BMW beschäftigt werden.
Translation A: Constant re-registration, which also doesn’t even work. Then you're forced to use Chrome, which also doesn’t work. You wonder what kind of programmers BMW employs.
Translation B: Constantly having to log in again, which doesn't even work. Then you're forced to use Chrome, which doesn't work either. It makes you wonder what kind of programmers BMW employs.

content: Remote Parking fehlt obwohl Fahrzeug es unterstützt.
Translation A: Remote Parking is missing even though the vehicle supports it.
Translation B: Remote Parking is missing although the vehicle supports it.

content: Es fehlen einfache Features die heute eigentlich Standart sind: -Kein Dark Mode! -Aktuell anliegender Ladestrom wird nicht angezeigt -Ladestrom kann nicht angepasst werden
Translation A: Simple features that are standard these days are missing: -No Dark Mode! -Currently applicable charging current is not displayed -Charging current cannot be adjusted
Translation B: It's missing simple features that are actually standard today: -No dark mode! -Current charging current is not displayed -Charging current cannot be adjusted

content: Es geht seit Tagen mal wieder gar nichts..! App Anmeldung und wenn man es mal schafft "drinnen" zu sein funktioniert auch nicht alles...Standort Fahrzeug abrufen, Route ans Fahrzeug etc... Im Auto alles aktuviert, GPS usw..ärgerlich bei Fahrzeugen in der Preisklasse..
Translation A: Nothing has been working again for days..! App login and even when you manage to get in, not everything functions... Retrieving vehicle location, sending routes to the vehicle, etc... Everything activated in the car, GPS, etc. Annoying for vehicles in this price class..
Translation B: Nothing has been working for days now...! I can't log in to the app, and even when I do manage to get in, not everything works...checking the vehicle location, getting a route to the vehicle, etc. Everything is updated in the car, GPS, etc....annoying for vehicles in this price range.

content: Eine Anmeldung ist seit Tagen nicht mehr möglich. "Es ist ein Fehler aufgetreten, später nochmals versuchen! 3020". Email an Hotline wird nicht beantwortet!😟
Translation A: “Logging in hasn’t been possible for days. An error occurred, try again later! 3020. Email to the hotline isn't being answered! 😟
Translation B: Registration hasn't been possible for days. "An error occurred, try again later! 3020." Emails to the hotline aren't being answered!😟

content: Bin mit der App sehr zufrieden. Hat uns in einer brenzligen Situation geholfen. Und zwar, hatten wir den Fahrzeugschlüssel im Kofferraum liegen und die Heckklappe geschlossen. Dank der App, konnten wir das Auto über unseren Smartphone wieder öffnen. 👍
Translation A: I'm very happy with the app. It helped us in a tricky situation. We had left the car key in the trunk and the tailgate was closed. Thanks to the app, we were able to unlock the car again via our smartphone. 👍
Translation B: I'm very happy with the app. It helped us in a tricky situation. We had left the car key in the trunk and the tailgate closed. Thanks to the app, we were able to unlock the car again using our smartphone. 👍

content: Wenn der Fahrzeugstatus über die App nicht aktualisiert werden kann, die Daten werden von der Vergangenheit angezeigt, dann müssen im Fahrzeug über das i Drive Menü alle BMW Dienste aktuallisiert werden. Wurden diese aktualisiert dann Connected Drive deaktivieren. Kurz warten dann Conneced Drive wieder aktivieren. Wärend der Aktualisierung darf das Fahrzeug nicht gefahren werden. Anschließend in der App den Fahrzeug Status akkualisieren. Bei mir hat es so funktioniert. Alles wieder ok.
Translation A: “If the vehicle status can’t be updated via the app, and the data displayed is from the past, then you need to update all BMW services in the vehicle via the iDrive menu. Once these have been updated, deactivate Connected Drive. Wait a short while, then reactivate Connected Drive. The vehicle must not be driven during the update. Afterwards, update the vehicle status in the app. This is how it worked for me. Everything is ok again.”

content: Die neue App hat die vorherige App nur verschlimmbessert. Respekt, ich dachte nicht das dieses Möglich ist. Warum kann man z. B. nicht mehr spontan die Klimatisierung einschalten? Zu teuer? Zu einfach? Zu Kundenfreundlich? Wenn man sich überlegt was man für die ganzen Softwarezusätze bezahlen muss ist es schon, gelinde ausgedrückt, eine Unverschämtheit was dafür geboten wird. Langsam tendiere ich dazu dass das nächste Auto kein BMW mehr wird.
Translation A: The new app has only made the previous app worse. Seriously, I didn't think that was possible. Why, for example, can you no longer spontaneously activate the climate control? Too expensive? Too simple? Too customer-friendly? Considering what you have to pay for all the software additions, it’s, to put it mildly, an outrage what is offered in return. I’m slowly tending towards the next car not being a BMW.
Translation B: The new app has only made the previous one worse. Respect, I didn't think that was possible. Why, for example, can't you spontaneously turn on the air conditioning anymore? Too expensive? Too simple? Too customer-friendly? When you consider what you have to pay for all the additional software, it's outrageous, to put it mildly. I'm slowly leaning towards my next car not being a BMW.

content: Bis jetzt funktionierte alles einwandfrei, in letzter Zeit fehlerhaft, einiges versucht aber ohne Erfolg.
Translation A: Up until now, everything worked flawlessly, recently buggy, some things tried but without success.
Translation B: Until now everything worked perfectly, recently it has been buggy, tried a few things but without success.

content: is von BMW...muss also gut sein ;) tolle App funktioniert und macht spaß
Translation A: It’s from BMW… so it has to be good ;) great app, works and is fun.
Translation B: is from BMW...so it must be good ;) great app works and is fun

content: Nach jedem Update wieder neu anmelden - genial
Translation A: Re-logging after every update – brilliant.
Translation B: Log in again after each update - brilliant

content: BMW ist besser als mein RangeRover. Vor allem was die digitale Technik an geht.
Translation A: BMW is better than my RangeRover. Especially when it comes to digital technology.
Translation B: BMW is better than my Range Rover, especially when it comes to digital technology.

content: Einfach genial wenn man stets in ein temperiertes Auto einsteigen kann - egal ob es draußen kalt oder heiß ist 😀
Translation A: Simply brilliant when you can always get into a pre-conditioned car – whether it's cold or hot outside 😀
Translation B: It's simply brilliant when you can always get into a temperature-controlled car - no matter whether it's cold or hot outside 😀

content: App funktioniert nicht. Ich kann die AGB nicht runter laden. Zeigt mir immer an das ich es später nochmal versuchen soll. Weil es momentan nicht möglich ist
Translation A: App isn’t working. I can’t download the Terms and Conditions. It always tells me to try again later because it’s currently not possible.
Translation B: The app doesn't work. I can't download the terms and conditions. It keeps telling me to try again later because it's not possible right now.

content: Dalla versione 2.11.0, con IDrive 6 e telefono Android 12 collegato via Bluetooth, non si attiva più l'opzione "app". L'ultima versione funzionante è la 2.9.3. Dalle versione 3.5.2 il problema è stato risolto.
Translation A: Since version 2.11.0, with iDrive 6 and an Android 12 phone connected via Bluetooth, the app option no longer activates. The last working version is 2.9.3. From version 3.5.2 the problem has been resolved.
Translation B: Since version 2.11.0, with IDrive 6 and Android 12 phone connected via Bluetooth, the "app" option is no longer activated. The latest working version is 2.9.3. Since version 3.5.2 the problem has been solved.

content: Riuscire a fare un'app. su misura rispondente quanto più possibile alle necessità del veicolo sarebbe un amibizioso traguardo. Si potrebbe dedicare una sessione specifica "veicolo" comprendente tutti gli interventi, manutenzione, sostituzioni e quant'altro per tenere elevato lo stato degli interventi. Ove possibile si potrebbe includere lo stato di usura dei componenti e altro aumentando così la performance delle app. Distinti saluti
Translation A: Achieving a custom app that responds as closely as possible to the needs of the vehicle would be an ambitious goal. A specific vehicle section could be dedicated to all interventions, maintenance, replacements, and so on, to keep the state of interventions high. Where possible, the wear status of components could be included, further increasing the app's performance. Sincerely
Translation B: Being able to make a custom app that responds as much as possible to the needs of the vehicle would be an ambitious goal. A specific "vehicle" session could be dedicated to include all the interventions, maintenance, replacements and anything else to keep the status of the interventions high. Where possible, the state of wear of the components and other things could be included, thus increasing the performance of the apps. Best regards

content: È da più di 2 settimane che l'app non funziona, oltre al fatto che la precedente aveva più funzioni e funzionava meglio. Vorrei ricordare che questo servizio è a pagamento.
Translation A: The app hasn't been working for over two weeks, on top of the fact that the previous version had more features and worked better. I’d like to remember that this service is a paid one.
Translation B: The app hasn't been working for more than 2 weeks, and the previous one had more features and worked better. I would like to remind you that this service is paid.

content: Pessima! Dopo appena un mese e mezzo dall'installazione si e' bloccata, come lamentato anche da altri utenti. Non aggiorna, infatti, lo stato e la posizione della vettura e non invia i comandi da remoto. Peraltro la funzione fa parte di un pacchetto a pagamento.
Translation A: Terrible! After just a month and a half since installation, it froze, as also reported by other users. It doesn’t update the vehicle's status and location, and it doesn't send remote commands. Moreover, this function is part of a paid package.
Translation B: Terrible! After just a month and a half from the installation it stopped working, as also complained by other users. In fact, it does not update the status and position of the car and does not send remote commands. Moreover, the function is part of a paid package.

content: Comandi da remoto verso la macchina molto lenti
Translation A: Remote commands to the car are very slow.
Translation B: Remote commands to the machine very slow

content: Utile, peccato che a volte non fa il refresh dei dati in tempo reale
Translation A: Useful, it’s a shame it doesn’t refresh data in real time sometimes.
Translation B: Useful, pity that sometimes it doesn't refresh the data in real time

content: La app funziona bene. Sarebbe molto utile poter impostare la pianificazione delle ricariche su base settimanale cosi da coincidere con le fasce dei gestori dell'energia elettrica che ad es. nel weekend hanno tariffa più bassa tutto il giorno.
Translation A: The app works well. It would be very useful to be able to set charging schedules on a weekly basis so they coincide with energy providers' time-of-use rates, which, for example, have a lower rate all day on weekends.
Translation B: The app works well. It would be very useful to be able to set the charging schedule on a weekly basis so as to coincide with the bands of the electricity providers who, for example, have a lower rate all day on the weekend.

content: sarebbe molto utile connessione con account Google
Translation A: It would be very useful to have connection with a Google account.
Translation B: It would be very useful to connect with Google account

content: Digital key non compatibile con s22, che vergogna
Translation A: Digital Key not compatible with S22, how embarrassing.
Translation B: Digital key not compatible with s22, what a shame

content: decisamente un grande aiuto per avere sempre l'autovettura sotto controllo
Translation A: definitely a great help for always keeping the car under control
Translation B: definitely a great help to always have the car under control

content: La vecchia app BMW connected era organizzata con layout a mio parere più chiaro e piacevole. Ma vabbè.. Ora la localizzazione del veicolo risulta più lenta, non utilizza più la dettagliata mappa google, inoltre non consente più di navigare a piedi verso il proprio veicolo. Secondo me con questa app si sono fatti non uno, ma ben due passi indietro rispetto la precedente. Se poi contiamo che è un sevizio a pagamento... Mah!!!....
Translation A: “The old BMW Connected app was organized with a layout that, in my opinion, was clearer and more pleasant. But okay… Now vehicle location is slower, it no longer uses the detailed Google Maps, and it no longer allows you to navigate on foot to your vehicle. In my opinion, with this app they’ve taken not one, but two steps backward compared to the previous one. And if we also factor in that it’s a paid service… Meh!!!…”
Translation B: The old BMW connected app was organized with a layout that in my opinion was clearer and more pleasant. But oh well... Now the localization of the vehicle is slower, it no longer uses the detailed Google map, and it no longer allows you to navigate on foot to your vehicle. In my opinion, with this app they have taken not one, but two steps back compared to the previous one. If we then consider that it is a paid service... Meh!!!....

content: facile da usare, efficente e utile per avere il controllo dell'auto da remoto
Translation A: Easy to use, efficient, and useful for having remote control of the car.
Translation B: easy to use, efficient and useful to have control of the car remotely

content: Serve un aggiornamento che risolva una volta per tutte il problema della registrazione viaggi... ogni tre per due quest'ultima non funziona. Se fosse un problema di ID9 intervenite per favore sul software dell'auto, altrimenti "i miei viaggi" rimane totalmente inutile (dato registra a random...).
Translation A: An update is needed to permanently fix the trip recording issue... it fails every three and two. If it's an ID9 problem, please intervene on the car's software, otherwise My Trips remains totally useless (data records randomly...).
Translation B: An update is needed to solve the trip recording problem once and for all... every now and then it doesn't work. If it's an ID9 problem, please intervene on the car's software, otherwise "my trips" remains totally useless (data records randomly...).

content: precisione e modalità di avviso sempre in anticipo
Translation A: Precision and advance warning mode.
Translation B: accuracy and always early warning mode

content: App stabile e precisa. Molto utile e molto comoda. Migliorerebbe un poco se desse la possibilità di gestire dallo smartphone le app dell'auto
Translation A: Stable and accurate app. Very useful and very convenient. It would improve a little if it offered the possibility to manage the car's apps from the smartphone.
Translation B: Stable and accurate app. Very useful and very convenient. It would improve a little if it gave the possibility to manage the car apps from the smartphone

content: L'applicazione è utile. La uso da 6 mesi, cioè da quando ho preso l.auto. È sempre andata bene, fino all.ultimo aggiornamento di pochi giorni fa. Ora, senza alcun motivo va in crash mentre la uso. Schermo nero e anche attendendo non cambia. Resta così. Bisogna chiuderla con tasto indietro del telefono o eliminarla dalle app aperte Poi riparte regolarmente. Attendo che torni funzionante al 100% per migliorare la valutazione
Translation A: The app is useful. I've been using it for 6 months, that is, since I got the car. It has always worked well, until the last update a few days ago. Now, for no reason, it crashes while I'm using it. Black screen and even waiting, it doesn't change. It stays like that. You have to close it with the phone's back button or delete it from the open apps. Then it restarts regularly. I'm waiting for it to be fully functional again to improve the rating.
Translation B: The application is useful. I have been using it for 6 months, that is, since I got the car. It has always worked well, until the last update a few days ago. Now, for no reason it crashes while I am using it. Black screen and even waiting does not change. It stays like this. You have to close it with the back button on the phone or delete it from the open apps. Then it restarts regularly. I am waiting for it to be 100% functional again to improve the rating.

content: All'inizio, non avendola mai avuto ho avuto qualche difficoltà, ma ora la consiglio a tutti.
Translation A: Initially, I had some difficulties not having used it before, but now I recommend it to everyone.
Translation B: At first, I had some difficulties, having never had it, but now I recommend it to everyone.

content: esperienza positiva con Bmw dal 2005
Translation A: Positive experience with BMW since 2005
Translation B: positive experience with BMW since 2005

content: Concordo con l'opinione di informatici incapaci in quanto sto cercando di recuperare la password inserisco il codice cliente presente nella mail e appare la dicitura dato errato. Senza parlare delle telefonate avevo 17 davanti ho atteso il mio turno e quando era arrivato la comunicazione è caduta. Stessa cosa un momento fa mentre parlavo con l'operatore. Se registrano le telefonate le ascoltino
Translation A: I agree with the opinion of incompetent IT people because I'm trying to recover my password, I enter the customer code from the email and the message incorrect data appears. Not to mention the phone calls: I had 17 in the queue, I waited for my turn, and when it was my turn, the connection dropped. Same thing just now while talking to the operator. If they record the phone calls, they should listen to them.
Translation B: I agree with the opinion of incompetent computer scientists as I am trying to recover the password I enter the customer code present in the email and the wording incorrect data appears. Not to mention the phone calls I had 17 in front of me I waited my turn and when it arrived the communication dropped. Same thing a moment ago while I was talking to the operator. If they record the phone calls they should listen to them

content: Quale funzione in più sarebbe stata utile....(apertura chiusura finestrini)

content: buona, utile e molto intuitiva.

content: Da una casa come la BMW potrebbero fare molto ma molto meglio
Translation A: “From a company like BMW, you could expect so much more.”
Translation B: From a company like BMW they could do much, much better

content: è divertente oltre che utile. avere i dati a portata di mano spesso torna comodo.

Translation B: It's fun as well as useful. Having data at hand often comes in handy.

content: Una applicazione utile, che fornisce buone informazioni

content: Il sistema antivirus mi segnala che l'applicazione è infettata e consiglia di rimuoverla, cosa che ho fatto. Potete verificare?
Translation A: My antivirus system flags the application as infected and recommends removal, which I’m doing. Can you check?
Translation B: The antivirus system tells me that the application is infected and recommends removing it, which I did. Can you check?

content: bella applicazione, io per ora la uso per controllare lo stato del mezzo e abbassare la temperatura nelle giornate assolate. non mi è chiara la differenza con l'app bmw connected. tra le due ho scelto questa.
Translation A: Nice application, so far I'm using it to check the vehicle’s status and lower the temperature on hot days. I’m not clear on the difference with the BMW Connected app. Between the two, I chose this one.
Translation B: nice app, for now I use it to check the status of the vehicle and lower the temperature on sunny days. I don't understand the difference with the bmw connected app. between the two I chose this one.

content: Aplicación penosa, en esta nueva actualización se cargan también la prestación del claxon en remoto. Una verdadera estafa. Cualquier vehículo tiene mejores prestaciones que la app de BMW. BMW = Sablazo y estafa.
Translation A: Miserable app, with this new update they’ve even loaded the remote horn function. A real rip-off. Any vehicle has better features than the BMW app. BMW = Rip-off and scam.
Translation B: Terrible app. This new update also cancels the remote horn feature. A real rip-off. Any vehicle has better features than the BMW app. BMW = Rip-off and a rip-off.

content: Vamos a peor, ni de abre.
Translation A: Getting worse and worse, it won't even open.
Translation B: We're getting worse, don't even open it.

content: Está todo bien,solo que me gustaría que si suena la alarma del coche la aplicación me informara
Translation A: Everything's fine, just that I would like it to notify me in the app when the car alarm sounds.
Translation B: Everything is fine, I just wish the app would inform me if the car alarm goes off.

content: Muy buena aplicación para tener datos y acceso al coche!

Translation B: Very good app to have data and access to the car!

content: Muy útil y fácil de usar.
Translation A: Very useful and easy to use.
Translation B: Very useful and easy to use.

content: La aplicación es muy completa y funciona bastante bien, pero tiene errores p.e. en el cálculo del kilometraje en las reseñas mensuales, o en las estadísticas de viajes.
Translation A: The app is very comprehensive and works quite well, but it has glitches, for example, in the calculation of mileage in the monthly reviews, or in the travel statistics.
Translation B: The app is very comprehensive and works quite well, but it has errors, for example, in calculating mileage in the monthly reviews or in the trip statistics.

content: Es una porquería. No se conecta porque seguro no había un buen enlce con los datos de los autos. Lanzan algo que no sirve !!
Translation A: It's a mess. It doesn't connect because surely there wasn’t a good link with the car’s data. They release something that doesn’t work!!
Translation B: It's rubbish. It doesn't connect because there probably wasn't a good connection to the car data. They're throwing up something useless!

content: Mejor coche,asistencia y app....muy difícil de mejorar👍
Translation A: Better car, assistance and app....very difficult to improve 👍
Translation B: Best car, assistance and app...very hard to improve👍

content: Me dice que lamentablemente el cambio automático del país asignado no es compatible con mi bmw. Estoy en México y tengo una X3 M40i 2018.
Translation A: It tells me that unfortunately, automatic country assignment changes are not compatible with my BMW. I’m in Mexico and have a 2018 X3 M40i.
Translation B: It tells me that unfortunately the automatic transmission for the assigned country isn't compatible with my BMW. I'm in Mexico and have a 2018 X3 M40i.

content: no me funciona spotify y ninguna app con esta nueva app
Translation A: Spotify doesn't work for me and neither does any other app with this new app.
Translation B: Spotify and no other app work for me with this new app.

content: La app debería incluir algún aviso cuando se activa la alarma del vehículo.
Translation A: The app should include some kind of notification when the vehicle alarm is activated.
Translation B: The app should include some kind of notification when the vehicle's alarm is triggered.

content: Una app sencilla de utilizar y muy completa y útil
Translation A: A simple app to use and very complete and useful.
Translation B: An easy-to-use, very complete and useful app

content: me permite saber dónde está el auto
Translation A: It lets me know where the car is.
Translation B: lets me know where the car is

content: La aplicación está muy bien le doy cuatro estrellas por que esta todo muy bien pero todavía no he leído un comentario sobre un fallo sobre serrar el vehículo si la puerta o las puertas está abierta le da cerrar y perfecto pero si se te olvida una o varias ventanillas no silve de nada el cierre a distancia yo he tenido que volver al coche en mas de una vez para cerrar ventanas así que le dare cinco es cuando arreglen este fallo por que la aplicación está muy completa pero ese fallo la estropea
Translation A: The app is very good, I give it four stars because everything is very good, but I haven't yet read a comment about a failure regarding locking the vehicle if the door or doors are open. It locks perfectly, but if you forget a window or several, the remote locking is useless. I'm having to return to the car more than once to close windows, so I'll give it five when they fix this failure because the application is very complete, but that failure ruins it.
Translation B: The application is very good, I give it four stars because everything is very good, but I have not yet read a comment about a bug about locking the vehicle. If the door or doors are open, it closes and is perfect. However, if you forget one or more windows, the remote locking is useless. I have had to return to the car more than once to close the windows, so I will give it five stars when they fix this bug because the application is very complete, but this bug ruins it.

content: Interesante aplicación para localizar el vehículo y gestionar su mantenimiento, así como otras funcionalidades. Debería poder localizarse el vehículo en marcha y no únicamente parado.
Translation A: Interesting app for locating the vehicle and managing its maintenance, as well as other functionalities. It should be possible to locate the vehicle while it's moving and not only when it's parked.
Translation B: Interesting app for locating vehicles and managing their maintenance, as well as other features. It should be possible to locate the vehicle while moving, not just when stopped.

content: La aplicación está muy bien. El control remoto me encanta, y poder comprobar el estado del vehículo, la ubicación, activar el aire antes de llegar al coche... No le pongo 5 estrellas porque no me parece justo que para unos coches el servicio remoto sea gratuito y para otros cueste 80€ al año.
Translation A: The app is really good. I love the remote control, and being able to check the vehicle status, location, activate the air conditioning before arriving at the car... I don't give it 5 stars because I don't think it's fair that for some cars the remote service is free and for others it costs €80 per year.
Translation B: The app is great. I love the remote control, and being able to check the vehicle's status, its location, and turn on the air conditioning before getting to the car... I'm not giving it 5 stars because I don't think it's fair that for some cars the remote service is free and for others it costs €80 a year.

content: Le falta muchísimo desarrollo a su app.
Translation A: It really lacks development.
Translation B: Your app needs a lot of development.

content: Como es usual en BMW, algo "actualizaron" y dejó de funcionar lo poco que hacía, ni siquiera abre y "olvidó" "miBMW"
Translation A: As is usual with BMW, they updated something and it stopped working, the little it did. It doesn't even open and forgot MyBMW.
Translation B: As usual with BMW, they "updated" something and the little it did stopped working, it doesn't even open and "forgot" "myBMW"

content: No funciona spotify, por favor revísenlo, en la app anterior funcionaba algunos días,pero bueno...pero en esta jamas ha funcionado Gracias!!!!
Translation A: Spotify isn't working, please review it. In the previous app it worked some days, but well...but it's never worked in this one. Thanks!!!!
Translation B: Spotify is not working, please check it. In the previous app it worked some days, but oh well... but it has never worked in this one. Thanks!!!!

content: Mucho peor que la anterior. Además, desde la última actualización, si no permites el acceso a la ubicación, no puedes abrirla. Connected dejaba el fondo en negro y daba información de la presión de las ruedas, cosa sin la que puedo pasar, pero no por tener que permitir acceso a la ubicación. Los mapas también funcionan peor, no sé si han dejado de usar google, pero no encuentra los sitios igual ni tiene todos los que tenía la anterior. Seguiré usando connected hasta que la quiten.
Translation A: Much worse than the previous one. Furthermore, since the last update, if you don't allow location access, you can't open it. Connected used to leave the background black and showed tire pressure information, something I can live without, but not for having to allow location access. The maps also function worse; I don’t know if they’ve stopped using Google, but it doesn’t find places the same way or has all the ones the previous version had. I’ll continue using Connected until they remove it.
Translation B: Much worse than the previous one. Also, since the latest update, if you don't allow location access, you can't open it. Connected left the background black and provided tire pressure information, something I can live without, but not because I have to allow location access. The maps also work worse. I don't know if they've stopped using Google, but it doesn't find the same places, nor does it have all the ones the previous one had. I'll continue using Connected until they remove it.

content: Tarda muchísimo y no da litros y autonomía en todos los modelos.
Translation A: It takes forever and doesn’t show liters and range for all models.
Translation B: It takes a long time and doesn't provide liters and autonomy in all models.

content: No me funciona desde hace meses. BMW no aporta solución. Sólo que hay que esperar a la siguiente actualización, que no se sabe cuándo saldrá
Translation A: It hasn't worked for months. BMW doesn’t offer a solution. They just say you have to wait for the next update, which we don’t know when it will be released.
Translation B: It hasn't worked for me for months. BMW offers no solution. I just have to wait for the next update, which we don't know when it will come out.

content: información al momento se esté donde se esté

Translation B: information at the moment wherever you are

content: Muy buena aplicación. Puedes ver en todo momento el estado del vehículo, programar la calefacción o el aire acondicionado, abrir/cerrar el coche de forma remota, ver la ruta que tienes que hacer desde el móvil y enviarla al BMW,...
Translation A: Very good application. You can always see the status of the vehicle, schedule the heating or air conditioning, remotely open/close the car, see the route you need to take from your mobile and send it to the BMW,...
Translation B: A very good app. You can check the vehicle's status at all times, schedule the heating or air conditioning, remotely lock and unlock the car, view your planned route from your phone and send it to your BMW, and more.

content: Muy fácil y muy útil

Translation B: Very easy and very useful

content: Fonctionne sur x5 de 2017, mais l associer avec here au lieu de maps, c est ridicule, impossible de trouver des adresses que l on trouvait avec maps.

content: Excellente application : l'essentiel au creux de la main 😉

content: très bien dans l'ensemble

content: Une excellente application qui donne des renseignements très utiles en temps réel.

Translation B: A great app that provides very useful information in real time.

content: Nul ! Dès que vous l'ouvrez on vous demande de changer de mot de passe puis de s'identifier 2x et il faut faire les mises à jour etc donc il faut déja 20minutes pour pouvoir avoir une app qui fonctionne bref après faut se connecter au wifi de la voiture qui te dit qu'il n'y a pas de conection alors que tu es parfaitement connecté, bref cet app est pire qu"une banque pour rien, car en plus elle ne fonctionne pas donc totalement inutile !
Translation A: Terrible! As soon as you open it, you’re asked to change your password then identify yourself 2x and you have to do the updates etc so it already takes 20 minutes to get an app that works, briefly. Then you have to connect to the car's Wi-Fi which tells you there’s no connection when you’re perfectly connected. Briefly, this app is worse than a bank for nothing, because on top of that it doesn't even work, so totally useless!
Translation B: Zero! As soon as you open it you are asked to change your password then to identify yourself 2x and you have to do the updates etc. so it already takes 20 minutes to be able to have an app that works in short after you have to connect to the car wifi which tells you that there is no connection while you are perfectly connected, in short this app is worse than a bank for nothing, because in addition it does not work so totally useless!

content: Excellente appli pour gérer un véhicule BMW, fonctionnelle et bien conçue !

Translation B: Excellent app for managing a BMW vehicle, functional and well designed!

content: Encore déconnecter est plus possible de ce connecter alors que cela fonctionne sur le site Web via bmw.fr

Translation B: It is still possible to disconnect and connect, although it works on the website via bmw.fr.

Translation B: 2021 BMW 1 Series: I think the app is great 👍

content: Depuis le 1er septembre l'application s'est déconnectée de la voiture sans raison apparente. J'ai supprimé et réinstallé l'application sans succès. Pourtant quand je suis dans la voiture un message de connection Bluetooth et WiFi est affiché par l'application sur mon téléphone.
Translation A: Since September 1st, the app has been disconnecting from the car for no apparent reason. I’ve deleted and reinstalled the app unsuccessfully. Yet when I’m in the car, a Bluetooth and WiFi connection message is displayed by the app on my phone.
Translation B: Since September 1st, the app has disconnected from the car for no apparent reason. I have deleted and reinstalled the app without success. However, when I am in the car, a Bluetooth and WiFi connection message is displayed by the app on my phone.

content: Bonne application qui mériterait d'être plus complète. Je mets 4 étoiles car les fonctions avancées et tellement utiles sont manquantes. (niveau adBlue et lave glace, pression des pneumatiques). J'espère que l'équipe de développeurs comblera rapidement ces lacunes.
Translation A: Good app that deserves to be more complete. I'm giving it 4 stars because the advanced and so useful functions are missing (AdBlue and washer fluid level, tire pressure). I hope the development team quickly fills these gaps.
Translation B: Good app that deserves to be more comprehensive. I'm giving it 4 stars because it lacks advanced and very useful features (AdBlue and windshield washer fluid levels, tire pressure). I hope the development team will quickly address these shortcomings.

content: Appli bidon qui n apporte pas grand chose
Translation A: Useless app that doesn't bring much.
Translation B: Fake app that doesn't add much

content: simple, fluide manque néanmoins des options.
Translation A: simple, fluid, but lacking options.
Translation B: simple, fluid but lacks options.

content: très pratique et bien conçu
Translation A: very practical and well designed
Translation B: very practical and well designed

content: Il est regrettable de d'avoir un smartphone dernière génération pour pouvoir utiliser une application.
Translation A: It’s regrettable to need a latest-generation smartphone to be able to use an application.
Translation B: It is unfortunate that you have to have a latest generation smartphone to be able to use an application.

content: Application bien faite certes avec fonctions basiques mais tout a fait suffisantes. Enfin depuis la derniere MAJ via remote software update (ce matin), la voiture ne veut même plus mettre a jour les infos de localisation, trajets, utilisateurs,... on dirait qu elle n a simplement plus accès a internet. Pour info, la voiture n a pas encore 6 mois.
Translation A: Well-made application, certainly with basic functions but entirely sufficient. Finally, since the last update via remote software update (this morning), the car no longer wants to update the location, journeys, users' information,... it’s as if it no longer has access to the internet. For your information, the car hasn't been out for less than 6 months.
Translation B: A well-made application, certainly with basic functions, but quite sufficient. Finally, since the last update via remote software update (this morning), the car no longer even wants to update location information, routes, users, etc. It seems like it simply no longer has internet access. For your information, the car is not yet 6 months old.

content: application permettant d'interagir efficacement avec le véhicule
Translation A: application allowing for effective interaction with the vehicle
Translation B: application allowing effective interaction with the vehicle

content: Abonnements à des tarifs exorbitants pour des services bien souvent offerts dans d'autres marques moins "prestigieuses" .....L'accès à de simples informations sur le véhicule ou l'envoi d'une destination au GPS et même la MAJ du GPS nécessite maintenant un abonnement sur mon véhicule de plus de 3 ans, décevant à l'heure ou toutes les MAJ d'applications Android ou IOS ou autres objets connectés sont totalement gratuites....
Translation A: Subscriptions at exorbitant prices for services often offered by other, less prestigious brands… Access to simple vehicle information, sending a destination to the GPS, and even GPS updates now requires a subscription on my vehicle that's over 3 years old – disappointing at a time when all updates for Android or iOS applications or other connected objects are completely free…
Translation B: Subscriptions at exorbitant prices for services often offered in other, less "prestigious" brands ..... Access to simple information on the vehicle or sending a destination to the GPS and even the GPS update now requires a subscription on my vehicle which is more than 3 years old, disappointing at a time when all the updates of Android or IOS applications or other connected objects are completely free....

content: Super application qui vous tient informé de l'état du véhicule et de sa position.
Translation A: Great app that keeps you informed about the vehicle's status and location.
Translation B: Great app that keeps you informed of vehicle status and location.

content: Bon le déverrouillage digital key toujours pas dispo, la dernière mise à jour disait qu'il était dispo rien. Oui j'ai la bmw digital key sur ma voiture. Mais pas presser du côté des développeurs de corriger le problème. Je trouve que pour du 4,6/5 c'est un peut surcote pour ce que c'est il manque trop de fonction, alors qu'on pourrais faire bien plus.
Translation A: Well, the digital key still isn't available, the last update said it was available, nothing. Yes, I have the BMW Digital Key on my car. But not in a hurry on the developers' side to fix the problem. I find that for a 4.6/5 it's a little overrated for what it is, too many functions are missing, when we could do so much more.
Translation B: Well, the digital key unlocking is still not available, the last update said it was available, nothing. Yes, I have the BMW digital key on my car. But there's no rush on the developers' side to fix the problem. I think that for 4.6/5 it's a bit overrated for what it is, it's missing too many functions, while we could do a lot more.

content: Je peux contrôler mon véhicule à distance. Régler la température de l'habitacle avant de partir, vérifier si tout est en ordre, son niveau de charge.... je peux regarder son environnement extérieur ou intérieur grâce aux caméras intégrées.... Vraiment très simple d'utilisation !
Translation A: I can remotely control my vehicle. Adjust the cabin temperature before leaving, check if everything is in order, its charging level.... I can view its exterior or interior surroundings thanks to the integrated cameras.... Really very simple to use!
Translation B: I can control my vehicle remotely. Adjust the cabin temperature before leaving, check if everything is in order, its charge level... I can look at its exterior or interior environment thanks to the integrated cameras... Really very easy to use!

content: Impossible de charger la dernière mise à jour du software de la voiture. Et on est obligé de passer par cette appli inutile pour le faire. Merci BMW.
Translation A: Impossible to load the latest software update for the car. And we're forced to go through this useless app to do it. Thanks, BMW.
Translation B: Unable to load the latest car software update. And we have to use this useless app to do it. Thanks, BMW.

content: application très utile, fonctionnelle, permet d'avoir toutes les informations sur le véhicule en temps réel.

Translation B: very useful, functional application, allows you to have all the information on the vehicle in real time.

content: Très pratique, contrôle du véhicule à tout moment.

Translation B: Very practical, vehicle control at any time.

content: plus rien ne fonctionne et en plus il me dis toujours que j'ai une fenêtre ouverte c'est vraiment chiant.
Translation A: Nothing works anymore, and on top of that, it keeps telling me I have a window open. It’s really annoying.
Translation B: nothing works anymore and what's more it always tells me that I have a window open, it's really annoying.

content: Depuis la mise a jour, impossible de se connecter. Il y a un message qui me dit "pas de connexion internet" alors que j'ai la 4g. Dommage car elle fonctionnait avant. Déçu.
Translation A: Since the update, it’s impossible to connect. There's a message telling me no internet connection even though I have 4G. A shame because it worked before. Disappointed.
Translation B: Since the update, I've been unable to connect. There's a message saying "no internet connection" even though I have 4G. Too bad because it worked before. Disappointed.

content: Ne se connecte pas bien au véhicule contrairement à la précédente application (bmwi3) Du coup , pas possible de lancer le préchauffage ... Bref pas terrible du tout
Translation A: Doesn't connect well to the vehicle unlike the previous app (bmwi3). So, it’s not possible to start the preconditioning... Briefly, it’s really not great at all.
Translation B: Does not connect well to the vehicle unlike the previous application (bmwi3) As a result, it is not possible to start preheating... In short, not great at all

content: Pour un véhicule électrique appli décevante par rapport à l'ancienne version : pas de jauge de niveau de charge batterie, pas de mode Edrive.. je désinstalle
Translation A: For an electric vehicle, a disappointing app compared to the previous version: no battery charge level gauge, no eDrive mode… I’m uninstalling.
Translation B: For an electric vehicle, the app is disappointing compared to the old version: no battery charge level gauge, no Edrive mode... I'm uninstalling
